reviews.review: This movie was an absolute blast! The MCU was able to bring Marvel's greatest characters in this one long marvelous film with loads of action and a thrilling blockbuster story.

A victim of one-liners and severe pacing issues. Not to mention 2 dozen characters each trying to do at least one thing. This isnt by any means a bad movie, its just dissapointing, empty whilst being overstuffed, and 100% a cash grab. Sadly, the glory days of the Golden Age of Marvel is over.

I thought it was a fine addition to the Marvel and Avengers collection.  However, it is unique in that it has very little re-watchability.  The 2 1/2 hour character fest allows for very little character engagement, the jam-packed story has very little nuance as we follow assortments of characters along various sub-quests, and its really a slog.  I purchased tickets in advance for Thurs openers, and Friday.  Saw Blade Runner 2049 seven times, Ragnarok five times, and have no intention of seeing this even a second time until just prior to the next one coming out.  Can't imagine sitting through it again.
Great beginning to the Infinity War. Looking forward to the resolution next year.

This movie is a correlation of 10 years of storytelling. A lot of these characters storylines have been leading up to this massive face off while others where just pulled in to it. It manages to juggle around many different characters from the Guardians of the Galaxy to the Avengers coherently and with ease. On top of all the ongoing storylines, juggling around characters they manage to add in a lot of surprises. 
Infinity War is roller coaster ride of emotion and nonstop action that manages to keep you on the edge of your seat throughout the entire movie and leaves you waiting for the end credit scene. It is as an epic comic book movie that cannot be compared to others in it genre. It goes above and beyond what other comic book movies do while keeping the stakes as high as they can go.
The best way to watch this movie is going in as blind as you can. Come in knowing barely anything and come out feeling in awe of the epicness you have just watched. 
This is the movie of the year.
The movie was awesome...best MCU movie to date. Thanos was awesome as the villain!

From the opening scenes till the end of the film is JAW DROPPING. Especially if you are a Marvel fan that has been following these characters the last 10 years. This one definitely delivers and has everything a fan could ask for.
An almost 3 hr long snuff film. Not for the casual movie goer. only for the die hard comic book fan.

Holy mackeral! I was wondering how they were going to pull it off and they did not disappoint.
I'll watch this about 100 times more.
Just when you thought you knew, you didn’t. When you thought it couldn’t get worse, it does. What a movie.
